config.question: Which of the following was indicative of Roosevelt’s belief in the racial inferiority of the African American population?

choices.content: his condemnation of black troops in the Brownsville affair
the appointment of African Americans to inferior positions only
the establishment of segregated public schools
the banning of African American suffrage during his tenure

answer_3.response: Roosevelt blamed African American soldiers stationed near Brownsville, Texas, after a night of violence there in August 1906. Acting on little evidence, he discharged “without honor” three companies of African American troops, six of whom held the Congressional Medal of Honor.
